// GET STARTED //////////////////////////////////////////////
- In your code, add "using Raskulls.ScriptableSystem;" to each class where you want to use scriptable objects Created by Scriptable System.
- Check out the link below for Tutorial.


// LINKS /////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Asset Link : http://u3d.as/2qAX
Documentation Link : https://docs.google.com/document/d/1AiPzrFJ2s9EsPVqmlOOhqK5d44SQL2Qc56IE5LV2BgY/edit?usp=sharing
Video Link : https://youtu.be/_xeZ2ujhtYs


// Note ////////////////////////////////////////////////////
- After Importing Package you can delete Example Folder
